hero.name: (ZeroCode_DevOps)
hero.description1: No traditional training, but infinite passion.
hero.description2: I build real projects with AI as my ally.

featuredProject.title: Featured Project
featuredProject.subtitle: Real enterprise application in production
featuredProject.description: Enterprise web application developed for J. Barranco Limpieza, a community cleaning services company in Madrid. The system comprehensively manages employees, clients, work routes, automatic billing, inventory control, and real-time communication. It includes three distinct portals: administrator, employee, and client, each with specific functionalities and role-based authentication.
featuredProject.quote: This system was developed <1>without prior training</1>, guided completely by <3>AI</3> and <5>validated in production</5>.

features.dashboard: Dashboard with real-time metrics and billing charts
features.management: Management of 51 clients and employees with role-based authentication
features.calendar: Interactive calendar with route and task planning
features.realtime: Real-time system for complaints, requests, and observations
features.mobile: Android mobile app with Capacitor + offline support (PWA)

description.p1: I don't come from the classic development path and I don't pretend to. My strength is not in memorizing syntax, but in <1>understanding problems, designing solutions</1> and leaning on <3>Artificial Intelligence tools</3> to <5>convert ideas into real applications</5>.
description.boxTitle: I work with AI as a <1>technical collaborator</1> that:

boxList.item1: Guides me in the code part
boxList.item3: Allows me to learn while calculating
boxList.item4: Gives me speed without sacrificing understanding

description.p2: My approach is practical: I am not a traditional programmer, but I am someone capable of <1>taking a project from idea to functional product</1>, understanding every step of the process and improving with every iteration.
description.p3: I believe in <1>transparency</1>, in <3>continuous learning</3> and in leveraging technology to <5>create value</5>.
description.p4: My true strength is <1>absolute commitment</1> to every project. I get involved 200%, obsessing over details and not resting until the result exceeds expectations. Every challenge is a learning opportunity, and every mistake is a step towards improvement.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my most recent work

1.description: Complete online store with simulated Auth, persistent cart and checkout.

2.description: Smart chat assistant with OpenAI integration and contextual memory.

3.description: Task management application with real-time collaboration and notifications.

4.description: Analytical dashboard to visualize investment portfolio metrics.

5.description: Weather application with detailed forecasts and interactive maps.

6.description: Blog platform with headless CMS, markdown and SEO optimization.

7.description: Cryptocurrency analytics dashboard with real-time data, interactive charts and market heatmap.

8.description: Premium beauty salon website features with fluid animations, interactive gallery and responsive design. Migrated to React + Vite.

crypto.title: Crypto Analytics
crypto.subtitle: Real-time cryptocurrency dashboard powered by CoinGecko

about.description: This dashboard simulates live cryptocurrency market data with dynamic pricing that updates every 30 seconds. Prices vary realistically to demonstrate real-time data visualization and auto-refresh capabilities.

crypto.footer: Simulated live data • Auto-updates every 30 seconds • Built with React + TypeScript + Recharts

blog.title: Thoughts
blog.subtitle: Reflections on the future of software development

1.title: Why "AI-First" is not just a Buzzword
1.excerpt: How artificial intelligence is redefining software architecture, from design to deployment, and why developers must adapt.

2.title: Beyond Copilot: Autonomous Agents
2.excerpt: The evolution of code assistants towards proactive companions capable of understanding the full business context and making architectural decisions.

3.title: The End of "Boilerplate" in Frontend
3.excerpt: Analyzing how new UI generation tools are eliminating repetitive work and allowing us to focus on pure business logic.
